articleTitle: Bitcoin setzt Rekordjagd fort: Kurs beträgt jetzt 33.867,50 Dollar
articleTitleTranslated: Bitcoin continues the record hunt: Price is now $ 33,867.50
articleContent: Die älteste und wichtigste Cyber-Devise steigt am Montag um fast 16 Prozent.
articleContentTranslated: The oldest and most important cyber currency will rise by almost 16 percent on Monday.
